alert.note: Alert for Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 10 at 5:00AM EST until December 10 at 5:45AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 445 AM CST. * At 400 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Destin, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Santa Rosa Beach, De Funiak Springs, Eglin Air Force Base, Freeport, Oakwood Hills, Portland, Alpine Heights, Villa Tasso, Blue Mountain Beach, De Funiak Spring Airport, Seaside, Rock Hill, Miramar Beach, Point Washington, Pleasant Ridge, Gulf Pines, New Home, Bunker, Grayton Beach, and Seagrove Beach. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 AM CST for the Panhandle of Florida.
